meta_title: Why Scheduled Maintenance Wastes Time: The 82% Failure Rule
meta_description: Scheduled maintenance wastes time because 82% to 89% of equipment failures are random and not age-related. Calendar-based PMs often cause infant mortality.
title: Why Scheduled Maintenance Wastes Time: Diagnosing the Inefficiency of Calendar-Based PMs
